task_description:
# Graduated Hint System

Implement a multi-level hint system that progressively reveals puzzle-solving insights without fully spoiling the solution. From strategic guidance to specific cell hints.

## Rationale
Many users want help without complete spoilers. This directly addresses the pain point of wanting to learn strategies without ruining the puzzle experience, differentiating from online solution lookups.

## User Stories
- As a puzzle learner, I want progressive hints so that I can learn without complete spoilers
- As a casual player, I want a nudge to get unstuck without revealing the whole solution
- As a power user, I want to understand why a placement is correct, not just what it is

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Level 1: General strategy hints without revealing specifics
- [ ] Level 2: Identify which region or constraint to focus on
- [ ] Level 3: Reveal a specific cell placement as a nudge
- [ ] Level 4: Show partial solution for stuck areas
- [ ] Users can progress through hint levels at their own pace
